en.title: Verification for Discord
en.error-loggedin: Warning: You are currently logged in to a different user.
en.verify-instructions: To verify, please enter your Discord handle in the box below.
en.verify-notice: Verification adds your Discord handle to your public profile.
en.verify-login: To verify, please log in to your Fandom account.
en.verify-complete: Done! Now, please go to the #verification channel and send the following text:
en.general-error: Something went wrong. The error was:
